 # Change Log
 All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
 
+## Trunk
+* New lints: [`mut_range_bound`], [`int_plus_one`]
+
 ## 0.0.163
 * Update to *rustc 1.22.0-nightly (14039a42a 2017-09-22)*
